channel.title: Need help setting up moparscape
channel.description:
I downloaded and Installed it I went to Run MoparScape The running bot opened and mopar opened then mopar closed Running bot showed:
java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\winnt\.mpr_file_store_32\main_file_cache.dat ( Access is denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:52) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\winnt\.mpr_file_store_32\cache.zip (Access is denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:126) at Update.(Update.java:34) at client.method67(client.java:3128) at client.method6(client.java:6228) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:43) at client.run(client.java:4081) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) You lost connection while downloading a needed file. Please download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your c:/winnt/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Fatal error, exiting. Press any key to continue . . .
If you can help please do.

item.title: Need help setting up moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

The new Moparscape is… Moparscape.jar! Lol, its 3.1 zour using, it doesnt work anymore, moparisthebest shut it down, try 3.2, Moparscape.jar

Read full topic

item.title: Need help setting up moparscape
item.dc:creator: @smart smart
item.description:
@smart wrote:

I downloaded and Installed it

I went to Run MoparScape

The running bot opened and mopar opened then mopar closed

Running bot showed:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\winnt\.mpr_file_store_32\main_file_cache.dat ( Access is denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:52) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\winnt\.mpr_file_store_32\cache.zip (Access is denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:126) at Update.(Update.java:34) at client.method67(client.java:3128) at client.method6(client.java:6228) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:43) at client.run(client.java:4081) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) You lost connection while downloading a needed file. Please download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your c:/winnt/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Fatal error, exiting. Press any key to continue . . .

If you can help please do.
